subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] RS 20-125
author: Carol B.
full_text:
I could have written this post myself!  I just completed the hack for the
RS20-125...AND....halfway through the first sweep, I heard my name! This
is awesome.

Carol B.







> Just picked up and modified the RS 20-125.  Before I gave it a test
> run, I made it clear I was only doing a test and that I did not intend
> to make any contact.  About half way through the first sweep, I heard
> my name.
>
> Very exciting and somewhat startling at the same time.  Hopefully I
> can get time to do an actual session tonight.  I understand it can
> take some time for the box to get "imprinted" as Bruce says.
>
> Thank you Steve for finding this hack and thanks to the others here
> for your endless help to everyone on the board.
>
> Jeremy
>
>
